data.title: Interlace India Pvt. Ltd.
data.text:
Position : Presales Consultant

Educational Qualification : BE/B.Tech/MCA/MBA

Experience & Skill : 6-15 Years

Responsibilities:

ØTo align with the Sales team and attend the client’s meeting to determine the requirement based on technical and business needs.

ØStudy and understand the RFP/RFQ/RFI document to prepare technical and commercial bid.

ØEnsuring that all the information is collected to propose the right solution as per the customer needs.

ØProvide the technical solution in professional way and also as per committed time frame.

ØCreate and confidently deliver the technical presentations internally and externally.

ØBuild relationship internally and externally and also develop team work by keeping colleagues updated on activities.

ØBuild relationship with the OEM partners and understand their solution before convert it in to the solution.

ØAble to understand the business requirement and risk factors involved to the organization and customer.

ØAdhere to the company quality policy and business process.

ØInstrumental to work on techno commercial proposals in association with budget, technical requirements and deliverables.

ØInteract with the project team to articulating the customer requirement to ensure the smooth transition from sales to delivery.

ØAbility to deliver the proof of concepts for the proposed solution.

ØWillingness to travel outside frequently.

Skill Set:

vTechnical, analytical and interpersonal skills required.

vAbility to communicate in an understandable, polite and friendly manner, both written and verbal

vStrong organizational skills and ability to multi-task in a small business environment.

vAvailability in response to needs of the customer for installation, maintenance and equipment.

vExperience on MS Office Suite (PPT, Excel, Word, Visio)

vMinimum 6-8 Years of experience in any one of the IT Infrastructure Specialization (Networking, Security /Server and Storage, Backup, HCI /Cloud Services / etc.,)

Job Location: Chennai

Notice Period : Immediate Joining Candidates or Less than 30 days of notice

Mail your CV : hr@interlaceindia.com

Position : AI Techno Functional Consultant

Educational Qualification : BE/B.Tech/MCA/MBA

Experience & Skill : 10-15 Years

Responsibilities:

Ability to understand a business problem and the available data and identify what techniques can be applied to answer the business questions

Given a business problem, estimate solution feasibility and potential approaches based on available data

Quickly prototype solutions and build models to test feasibility of solution approach

Build statistical models, train and test them to and drive towards the optimal level of model performance

Develop robust, scalable and production grade data pipelines and machine learning models to answer key business problems against big, small or huge volumes of diverse range of data sets.

Build scalable AI / ML: solutions as appropriate - may depend on the requirements and will span NLP, Computer / Machine Vision, Clustering, Segmentation, Deep Learning etc.

Provide latest AI solution releases and existing models and to work on qualifying them further through the model development lifecycle (MDLC)

Working with data scientists, platform, Data lake, Architecture and infrastructure teams to ensure the model requirements are fully understood and implemented

Work closely with clients, both in the Business Domain and with Technical staff members

Educating teams on the implementation of new technologies and initiatives

Writing reusable piece of code following best software engineering practices accommodating common design patterns and OOPS

Helping with various training activities

Work across the spectrum of reporting and data visualization, statistical modeling and supervised learning tools and techniques and apply the right level of solution to the right problem

Work in highly collaborative teams that strive to build quality systems and provide business value

Skill Set

10+ years of relevant experience in a delivery focused team

Strong coding ability in Python, and general software development skills (source code management, debugging, testing, deployment, etc.) is a must

Experience with building predictive statistical, behavioral or other models via supervised and unsupervised machine learning, statistical analysis, and other predictive modeling techniques

Experience across Structured, Semi-Structured and Unstructured data along with the appropriate modeling techniques based on the business requirements

Knowledge of both traditional as well awareness with existing state of the art methods in Machine Learning, NLP, Document Classification, Transfer Learning, Information Extraction and Retrieval with a proven track record of applying them to real problems.

Experience in Computer Vision techniques - processing and handling of images and videos, as well as detection / classification techniques

Experience with Azure / AWS / GCP AI services and platforms is a plus

Experience in micro service based architectures with model containerization using Docker is a must (Kubernetes experience will be an added advantage)

Ability to communicate the requirements and deliverables effectively to both technical teams as well as non-technical domain specialists

Strong team player; ability to provide both a strong individual contribution but also work as a team and contribute to wider goals is a must in this dynamic environment

Strong verbal and written communication skills to establish proper communications within the team and clients

Job Location: Chennai

Notice Period : Immediate Joining Candidates or Less than 30 days of notice

Mail your CV : hr@interlaceindia.com
